item.title: What is Repairrabbit API?
item.description: RepairRabbit API will allow you to create a new presentation layer—like an app, a website, or a widget. It can be used to distribute services and information to new audiences. You can easily transfer data to/from different systems and keep it safe. We deliver API for all the RepairRabbit features such as appointments, tickets, inventory, invoice, etc. Thus, you can create a customised solution on top of RepairRabbit API in a secured manner.

item.title: How is dashboard useful?
item.description: Dashboard will show you summary of every section of Repair Rabbit. In addition, it can be used to perform small operations on majorly used sections like, Add Appointments Here, you can directly add appointments for the customers. Add Tickets Here, you can directly add tickets for the customers. Add Invoice Here, you can directly add new invoice. Add Employee Here, you can directly add new employee. Add customer Here, you can directly add new customer.

item.title: What is a ticket in RepairRabbit?
item.description: The ticket is a confirmation to the customers for the details on a product given for repair. When an appointment is confirmed, it gets converted into a ticket.

item.title: How to add an additional accessories?
item.description: Click “Customers” Click “New” Click “Add" Click “New invoice” Add required details of additional purchase. Click “+” sign to add multiple items to the invoice Click “Save”. System will confirm your action, then click “OK”.

item.title: How to add a new device?
item.description: Click “Master management” Click “New” Add required details, and “add ” Device will be added.

item.title: How to use the inventory feature?
item.description: View a complete summary of your stock easily in just one click by hitting on “View Stocks.” “Transfer Stocks” will show you the summary of the transferred stock. “Add Stocks” will help you to add new stock. “Stock History” will summarize the details of stock transferred to multiple locations. “Return Stock” summarizes the history of stock returns.

item.title: How to edit data of existing customer ?
item.description: Click “Customers” Select the customer and click “Edit” Edit the required information and click on “Edit” Now, your edited information has been saved.

item.title: How to manage holidays?
item.description: Under “Store holiday” feature all the holidays can be managed. You can Add, edit or delete holidays. Process to add holidays Go to “master management” Go to “Store Holiday” Click “New” Fill in all the necessary details and click “Add” On clicking “Add”, holiday will be added. Process to edit holidays Go to “Master management” Go to “Store Holiday” Select the holiday to be edited and make required changes. Then click “Edit” New changes has been saved.

item.title: How to add new employees and their data ?
item.description: Click “Employees” Click “New” Fill in necessary details about an employee, then click “Add”. Click “Add” Employee has been added to the list.

item.title: What is an appointment in RepairRabbit?
item.description: Appointment is an arrangement of assigning service to make your business process systematic and time savvy. With the help of an appointment, a customer can know or book the exact date and time for his/her repair.

item.title: How to check revenue generated on the dashboard?
item.description: “Dashboard” Select “Date” and “Store” and click “Search” Here, the system will show the exact amount of revenue generated.

item.title: How to generate ticket for the new customers?
item.description: Click “Tickets” Click “New” Click “Add new customer” Fill in all the required details and “add”. After ‘adding", the system will display an empty ticket. Fill in required details in the ticket and “add”. New ticket will be generated with unique id.

item.title: How to add a new store?
item.description: Click “Master management” Click “Stores” Select “New” from top right corner Add required details and click “Save And Next” Select the products and click “Save And Next” Add required details, and click “Add”. Store will be added.

item.title: How to edit an existing image?
item.description: To edit an earlier image, Click “Master Management” Click on “Products” Search the product and click “edit” Tap on the image and click on existing image from “ click to select file”. Now replace with the new image, click “save”.

item.title: How to create a new invoice for a new customer?
item.description: Click “Invoices” Click “New” Fill in necessary details about a customer. Click “Add”, it will display an empty invoice Fill all the required details in the invoice and click “Save” Here, system will ask you to confirm your action to generate “invoice” Click “ok” The new invoice has been generated.

item.title: Do past holidays automatically get removed?
item.description: As this is a manual process, a holiday doesn’t get removed automatically.

item.title: How to create a new appointment?
item.description: It’s easy to create a new appointment either for new customers or for existing customers. Create new appointment for new customers Dashboard > Add Appointment Or Appointments > New > Add New customer > Fill Details > Add Click “New” Click “Add New Customer” Fill in details, and “Add”. Click “Add” Again fill the details required for product repair. Click “Add” An appointment is created. Create new appointment for existing customers Dashboard > Add Appointment

item.title: How to add a new customer?
item.description: Click “Customers” Click “New” Fill in customer’s information, click “Add” New customer has been added to the customer’s list.

item.title: What is an administrator privilege?
item.description: RepairRabbit has several features. You ( System Admin ) have all privileges to use but, it is not feasible that everyone has access to all the features. So, “System Admin” can decide which privileges are given to whom. The categories which have different privileges are: System Admin Store Admin Employee Customer

item.title: How to use RepairRabbit API?
item.description: To use RepairRabbit API, you need to whitelist your domains/subdomains (from where you are going to access the RepairRabbit API) with the RepairRabbit. Whitelisting of the domain is necessary to prevent any unauthorized access to the API. So, Your data can be secured with the RepairRabbit. The admin of the RepairRabbit can whitelist your domains/subdomains. It can be done from the API Settings of RepairRabbit admin panel. Click “API Settings” So, If your application is running at web.

item.title: What are the core advantages of RepairRabbit API?
item.description: Suppose, you are running a repair business and have a manual process for managing appointments, tickets, stores, inventories, etc. and it becomes messy to manage all those things. At that time RepairRabbit API can help you to build your own customised solution and your own customised UI to serve your needs. If you already have a software solution but are not satisfied with it, we’re here to help. Suppose, you have customers' database saved in another system and you want to move that data to the RepairRabbit application, you can use our API to do it.

item.title: Settings
item.description: Following configurations can be done from the settings page. General Mail Vat Modules(Accessories) Miscellaneous General In general settings, users can change following configurations Application Name Currency Company Name Company Phone Number Company Email For Information Company Email For Support Company Website Example: Application Name: Repair Rabbit App Logo: Logo Image Currency: &euro; Company Name: RepairRabbit Company Phone Number: 909-909-9879 Company Email For Information: info@repairrabbit.com Company Email For Support: support@repairrabbit.

item.title: How to determine the total value of stock?
item.description: “Dashboard” “Total price of stock” Select the “Product” and click “Search” Here, you wll get exact amount of stock.

item.title: How to create ticket for exsisting customers?
item.description: Click “Tickets” You can generate ticket for existing customer by searching for the customer with the help of search bar. Click “New” Search customer by “Name” Fill the required details and click “Add” A new ticket has been created.

item.title: How to check the store status?
item.description: If a customer is making a booking on Store holiday, the system will not accept the booking. Moreover, “Store menu” will also show the opening and closing time. Click “Master management” Click “Stores” Now select the store. Here, the system will display all the data about selected store.

item.title: How to create a new invoice for existing customer?
item.description: Click “Invoices” Search customer by “Name” or “Email” Fill in the details Click “Save” You’ll get a message “Are you sure to generate the invoice?” Click “OK”

item.title: How to transfer stock from one store to another store?
item.description: “Transfer Stocks” will help you to transfer stock to a single store only. Click “Inventory” Click “Transfer Stocks” Add details Click “Transfer Stock”

item.title: How to convert appointments into tickets?
item.description: Click “Appointments” Click “View” Click “Start Repair” You will get a message “Are you sure to convert this appointment into ticket?” then click “OK” Appointment will be converted into a ticket.

item.title: How to add the list of existing customers into RepairRabbit?
item.description: Click “Customers” Click “Select File” then click “Upload File” Now, your existing customer data has been uploaded.

item.title: How to assign privileges to different categories?
item.description: While adding a new employee, you can assign any one category from System Admin Store Admin Employee Click “Employees” Click “New” Fill the required details and assign privilege Click “Add” Important Privilege for Customers will be automatically assigned. On adding a new Customer, the registered email of Customer would be his login Id and Password will be sent automatically to registered email.

item.title: Email Templates
item.description: The system must have the following key settings in a .env file to send e-mails successfully from the system: COMPANY_EMAIL_SUPPORT= COMPANY_EMAIL_INFO= COMPANY_POLICY_SERVICE_MAIL= MAIL_DRIVER= MAIL_HOST= MAIL_PORT= MAIL_USERNAME= MAIL_PASSWORD= MAIL_ENCRYPTION= MAIL_FROM_ADDRESS= MAIL_FROM_NAME= MAIL_REPLY_ADDRESS= MAIL_REPLY_NAME= (in case of mailgun) MAILGUN_DOMAIN= MAILGUN_SECRET= These settings are also available on settings page of Admin. The keys in .env can also be changed from the settings panel. List Of Email Templates Appointment Status Is No Show & Unconfirmed Appointment Confirmation Mail Reminder E-Mail Appointment Notification To Store New Ticket Creation Ticket Update Password Reset Ticket Notification To Store New User Created Ticket Updated With Policy Number Retarget E-Mail Template Appointment Status Is No Show & Unconfirmed An e-mail will be sent to the user when the appointment status is updated as no_shows=1.

item.title: How to review all the tickets for all the stores?
item.description: You can review list of tickets for the specific store as well as for all the stores (if applicable) together. To view tickets generated by all the stores, “Tickets” Select “All stores” from the top right corner of your screen List of tickets generated by all stores will be displayed.

item.title: Will I get notified of a new appointment booked by the customers?
item.description: Sorry, you will not receive any notification of the new appointment booked. You can check it directly from the dashboard “appointments”.

item.title: How to view invoices generated in the past?
item.description: Here you can check the summary of invoices with specific duration (Day, Week, Month). Click “Invoices” Select the date, week or month, and click “Apply” The detailed summary for the requested time will be shown

item.title: How to add stock?
item.description: Click “Inventory” Click “Add Stocks” Add the required details about a product Click “Add Stock” System will show the details updated by the user.

item.title: Do customers have access to Repair Rabbit? How to provide login details to customers?
item.description: Login details like e-mail ID and password for customers can be provided by sending an e-mail on the registered e-mail ID. Customers can login into customer portal of RepairRabbit with the assigned login details.

item.title: How can customers book an appointment?
item.description: Customers can now easily book an appointment through a customer web portal where they can sign in with their registered e-mail ID and password.

item.title: How to check or validate performance of an individual employee?
How to review tickets for the specific store?
item.description: You can review list of tickets for the specific store. To view tickets generated by particular store, Click “Tickets” Select store name from the top right corner of your screen. ![How to review tickets for the specific store?](/images/tickets/how_can_i_review_tickets_for_specific_branch/Select the branch from the top right corner.png) List of tickets generated by selected store will be displayed.

item.title: How an email template works?
How to add device image?
item.description: “Master management” Click “Devices” Click “New” “Click to select file” Click “Add”. Image has been added

item.title: How to check stock history for single store?
item.description: Click “Inventory” Click “View Stocks” Here, system will display stocks' record summary Select the store from top right corner to see its stock history Now, the system will display the stock history for the selected store

item.title: How to help the customer to generate new password?
item.description: Only system admin has access to change the password of a customer. To generate new password, Click “Customers” Search the “Customer” Click “Change Password” from “Actions”

item.title: How to prepone or postpone the appointments?
item.description: Click “Appointments” Search the customer Click “Edit” Select “date” and “time” to edit existing appointment Click “Save” Please Note : Passed dates cannot be modified.

item.title: How to provide login details of the software RepairRabbit to employees?
item.description: On adding a new employee, the e-mail ID of employee would be his login ID. Password will automatically be sent to that e-mail ID.

item.title: How to print a ticket?
item.description: Click “Tickets” Click “Print”

item.title: How to edit description of device categories?
item.description: Click “Master management” Click “Device Categories” Search the device Select the device and click “Edit”

item.title: How to check record of stocks for multiple stores?
item.description: Click “Inventory” Click “View Stocks” Select “All Stores” from the top right corner It will summarize the stock for “All Stores”

item.title: Will customers get notified when an appointment is created?
item.description: Yes, customers will be notified for booked appointment via email.

item.title: How to recover a deleted appointment?
item.description: You cannot recover the deleted appointments. You have to create a new appointment.

item.title: What if any employee forgets the login credentials of the software?
How does RepairRabbit help my business?
item.description: RepairRabbit software enhances customer service and boosts the productivity. RepairRabbit is a simple software with extraordinary features!

item.title: How to delete a ticket?
item.description: Click “Tickets” Search customer by “Name” Click “Delete” from “Action” A confirmation message will pop up. Click “Yes, delete it!” System will show you a message “Ticket has been deleted", click “OK”.

item.title: How to check store wise invoice?
item.description: Click “Invoices” Select the specific store from the top right corner Now, the system will display invoices for selected store.

item.title: How to check existing invoice, appointments, and tickets of the customer?
item.description: Click “Customers” Search customer by “Name” or “Customer Email” Click “View” Select “Tickets”, “Appointments” or “Invoices” for detailed information of any of the category

item.title: How to assign appointment to selected employee ?
item.description: Appointments cannot be assigned to selected employees.

item.title: When to use active or inactive status?
item.description: Once an employee joins the organization or shop, he will be marked as an active but if an employee leaves the Shop or Organisation, he needs to be marked as “ Inactive ”. Click “Employees” Search employee by “Name” or “Email” Click “Edit” Click “Save”

item.title: Is there a trial version?
item.description: There is a demo version which you can try it for free

item.title: How to check invoices generated for all the stores together?
item.description: Click “Invoices” Select “All Stores" from the top right corner. On selecting “All Stores", the system will show the invoices of all the stores together.

item.title: What is the difference between price & additional fees?
item.description: Sum total of services provided is called “Price” and the additional price of accessories purchased by a customer is called “Additional Fee.”

item.title: Is there a limit to the number of tech logins per store?
item.description: No, you can create as many “administrator” and/or “technician” logins as you require.

item.title: Is it possible to use one ticket for multiple devices?
item.description: No, a different ticket needs to be generated for a different device.

item.title: How to email an invoice?
item.description: Click “Invoices” Click “New” Fill the required details and click “Add” System will provide you option to email invoice Select the checkbox “Do you also want to send an e-mail ?” to email invoice

item.title: How to edit product information?
item.description: Click “Master Management” Search and select product Click “Edit” Edit the information you need to chang, and click “Save”

item.title: How to arrange tickets by date?
item.description: You can arrange tickets in ascending or descending order as follows : Click “Tickets” Click up arrow to see tickets in ascending order. Click down arrow to see tickets in descending order.

item.title: What are the different repair businesses that RepairRabbit supports?
item.description: Repair Rabbit supports every service related to repairs. This software helps to fix any type of repair/ fixing. This also includes a Computer Repair Store, Cell Phone Repair, Laptop repair store, Tablet repair store, MacBook repair store, Android repair store, iPhone repair store, Printer repair store, Projector repair store, Laptop screen repair store, Computer screen repair store, Tablet screen repair store, MacBook screen repair store, Android screen repair store, iPhone screen repair store.

item.title: How to edit an invoice?
item.description: Sorry, you cannot edit an invoice.

item.title: Can I export my data?
item.description: Yes, you can export data related to appointments, tickets, customers, invoices, employees, store holiday, stock, stock history, device categories, device, products, stores, and email templates into CSV format.

item.title: What is the invoice process post ticket creation?
item.description: Click “Tickets” Search customer by “Name” Click “View” from “Action” Fill in required details and click “Add”. Ticket is generated and system will show all the details related to the ticket. Click “Generate Invoice” Now, invoice has been generated.

item.title: How to print an invoice?
item.description: Click “Invoices” Select the invoice you want to get printed. Click “Print”

item.title: Can I notify customers via e-mail?
item.description: Yes, you can notify your customers via e-mail using e-mail templates.

item.title: How to recover the deleted tickets?
item.description: We are sorry, you cannot recover a deleted ticket. You need to create a new ticket.

item.title: What is the discount process in an invoice?
item.description: The amount and the description for the given discount will be added to the invoice generation.

item.title: What reports are available?
item.description: You can have quick access to reports with just one click. Dashboard shows and summarise reports of different modules. You can easily check reports on Revenue, Stock, Employees daily workflow, Appointments, Tickets, Employee status and store status.

item.title: How to delete a specific product record?
item.description: Click “Master Management” Click “Products” Now search the product Select the product and click “Delete” You will get a confirmation message “Are you sure?". Click “Yes, delete it!”

item.title: How to recover deleted tickets from invoice?
item.description: You will not be able to recover tickets, once it has been deleted.

item.title: How to get an overview of all tasks?
item.description: Click “Calendar” You can also review the Tasks for particular Month. View Task Summary with Exact dates.
